mapper.select: select to_char(DATE(GENERATE_SERIES(DATE (substring(#{procDt},1,7) || '-01') , (date_trunc('MONTH', (substring(replace(#{procDt},'-',''),1,6)||'01')::date) + INTERVAL '1 MONTH - 1 day'),'1 day')),'YYYY-MM-DD') as date

select b.sys_menu_no , coalesce(b.apnd_yn,'-') as apnd_yn --등록권한 , coalesce(b.save_yn,'-') as save_yn --수정권한 , coalesce(b.drop_yn,'-') as drop_yn --삭제권한 , coalesce(b.upload_yn,'-') as upload_yn --자료업로드권한 , coalesce(b.dnload_yn,'-') as dnload_yn --자료다운로ㄷ권한 , coalesce(b.list_prt_yn,'-') as list_prt_yn --리스트출력권한 , coalesce(b.info_prt_yn,'-') as info_prt_yn --상세내역출력권한 , coalesce(b.per_info_lvl,0) as per_info_lvl --개인정보접근권한 from auth_user a join auth_user_menu b on a.auth_user_no = b.auth_user_no and b.sys_menu_no = #{sysMenuNo} where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.auth_cd = #{authCd}

select extract(epoch from to_date(substring(#{dateFr},1,10),'YYYY-MM-DD')) ::integer as start_unix_time --시작일시 unixTime , case when to_char(to_date(substring(#{dateTo},1,10),'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') then extract(epoch from now()) ::integer + (3600 * 9) --3600 * 9 = 해당월마지막일자 18:00 else extract(epoch from to_date(substring(#{dateTo},1,10),'YYYY-MM-DD')) ::integer + (3600 * 9) end - extract(epoch from to_date(substring(#{dateFr},1,10),'YYYY-MM-DD')) ::integer as unix_term --종료일시 - 시작일자의 unixTime , (select max(make_seq) + 1 from sys_menu ) as menu_cnt --처리매뉴 최대 Sequence , (select max(make_seq) + 1 from user_info) as user_cnt --사용자 최대 Sequence

/* 창고목록 (cmmnMapper.getComboWh) */ select 0 as seq , null as value ,'창고선택' as text union select 1 , a.wh_no , concat(a.wh_nm,'(',b.code_nm,')') from wh_info a join code_info b on a.save_tmpr = b.code_no where a.used_yn = 'Y' and a.wh_tp = #{whTp} order by seq, text
